New Records: Moussa Diabate is now the franchise record holder for rebounds in a game without a made shot.
Key Match Events: Brandon Miller dominated the third quarter with five 3-pointers and 17 points
LaMelo Ball dominated the fourth quarter with a 21-4 Hornets run to end the game
The Hornets defense was incredible, especially in the second half, allowing just 57 points in the final three quarters
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Lee emphasized the importance of strong perimeter defense
The duel between LaMelo Ball and Tyrese Haliburton was highlighted as a key matchup
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball reinforced his NBA best fourth quarter scoring average
Moussa Diabate struggled to catch a couple of passes but got his hands on a ton of rebounds and loose balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Eastern Conference is really weak this year
The Hornets visit a 1-7 76ers team that's missing its two best players
